notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: Experiments were conceived by L.C.E., A.V.G., M.G. and G.S.C.N.; M.G. and G.S.C.N. conducted the experiments. G.S.C.N. and L.B. prepared the constructs and performed inmuno fluorescence experiments. M.G. performed data acquisition for RICS and 2D-pCF experiments. M.G. and L.C.E. analyzed data. A.H.R. performed EGFP solution imaging. L.C.E., A.V.G., M.G. and G.S.C.N. wrote the paper. All the authors discussed the results and reviewed the manuscript.
